job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltulgtltligtDo you love the field of deep learning and would you love a job with expectations to keep abreast on the stateofthe art in language processingltligtltligtAnd a job also with expectations to continuously move the performance needle for the businessltligtltligtDo you resonate with the need for reproducible research and robust data pipelinesltligtltligtCan you write solid well engineered code and work in a team environment of highly capable and motivated individualsltligtltligtAre you excited at the idea of helping to build our next generation of machine learning tools analytics platforms and languagemath assessment algorithmsltligtltulgtltpgtWorking closely with a small team of experts you will have a unique opportunity to play a leading role in migrating machine learning based solutions from RampampD to productlevel operational deliveryltpgtltpgtThe team offers a unique environment for extremely skilled and motivated thinkers Our culture is highly charged with people who are passionate about a cause using technology to enhance students educational experiences Our team has been building machine learning solutions for educational markets since 2004ltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltpgtRequired SkillsltpgtltulgtltligtMS or PhD in a quantitative field CS EE statistics math data science requiredltligtltligt5 years experience in the field of natural language processing NLPltligtltligt5 years professional experience as a software engineer or data scientistltligtltligtStrong coding capabilities in Python andor RltligtltligtExperience with Linux and AWS Kubernetes a big plusltligtltligtProven ability to build neural networking models for natural language applicationsltligtltligt5 years experience TensorFlow PyTorch or KerasltligtltligtStrong in using Jupyter notebooks for research and data analyticsltligtltulgtltpgtltpgt
